description: The OpenAlex ID for this venue.
name: id

description: The ISSN-L identifying this venue.
name: issn_l

description: The ISSNs used by this venue. Many publications have multiple ISSNs (see above), so ISSN-L should be used when possible.
name: issn

description: The name of the venue.
name: display_name

description: The name of this venue's publisher.
name: publisher

description: The number of Works this this venue hosts.
name: works_count

description: The total number of Works that cite a Work hosted in this venue.
name: cited_by_count

description: Whether this is currently fully-open-access venue. This could be true for a preprint repository where everything uploaded is free to read, or for a Gold or Diamond open access journal, where all newly published Works are available for free under an open license. We say currently because the status of a Venue can change over time. It's common for journals to flip to Gold OA, after which they may make only future articles open or also open their back catalogs. It's entirely possible for a Venue to say is_oa: true, but for an article from last year to require a subscription.
name: is_oa

description: Whether this is a journal listed in the Directory of Open Access Journals (DOAJ).
name: is_in_doaj

description: Alternate titles for this Venue, as obtained from the ISSN Centre and individual work records, like Crossref DOIs, that carry the Venue name as a string. These are commonly abbreviations or translations of the Venue's canonical name.
name: alternate_titles

description: An abbreviated title obtained from the ISSN Centre.
name: abbreviated_title

description: The starting page for navigating the contents of this venue; the homepage for this venue's website.
name: homepage_url

fields.name: openalex
fields.description: This venue's OpenAlex ID. Same as Venue.id

fields.name: issn_l
fields.description: This venue's ISSN-L. Same as Venue.issn_l

fields.name: mag
fields.description: This venue's Microsoft Academic Graph ID

fields.name: issn
fields.description: A list of this venue's ISSNs. Same as Venue.issn

name: ids
description: All the persistent identifiers (PIDs) that we know about for this venue, as key: value pairs, where key is the PID namespace, and value is the PID. IDs are expressed as URIs where possible.
The Venue's article processing charge in US Dollars, if available from DOAJ.
name: apc_usd
societies
description: Societies on whose behalf the Venue is published and maintained, obtained from our crowdsourced list.
The country that this venue is associated with, represented as an ISO two-letter country code.
name: country_code

description: The type of venue
name: type
counts_by_year
description: works_count and cited_by_count for each of the last ten years, binned by year.
A URL that will get you a list of all this venue's Works.
name: works_api_url

description: The last time anything in this Venue object changed, expressed as an ISO 8601 date string. This date is updated for any change at all, including increases in various counts.
name: updated_date

description: The date this Venue object was created in the OpenAlex dataset, expressed as an ISO 8601 date string.
name: created_date
